title: Please not again.
body: The same shit happend i swear to god if i get leaverbuster.....

replies.body:
http://prntscr.com/czz2mt 
fucking thanks riot, i get something that i dont deserve, while i just finished one

5-game penalties are a result of a *consistent* and *recent* trend of leaving matches. If you're experiencing some sort of technical issue that is causing you to D/C from games, please let me know so we can work on solving it together.
